edu.southalabama.csc527.smallworld.textui

Class TextUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.southalabama.csc527.smallworld.textui.TextUtilities

  • public class TextUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    A convenience class of handy constants and methods for working with text.

      The operating system-specific line separation character.

      Convenience constant for adding two line separators at once.

    • Method Detail

      • getDirectionsFrom

        public static java.lang.String getDirectionsFrom(Place place)
        Gets several lines of directions about the possible travel destinations from a place. These are in the form "To the north you see the Hall."
        Parameters:
        place - the place of origin
        Returns:
        directions and travel destinations from this place.

      • getItems

        public static java.lang.String getItems(Place place)
        Gets several lines of text regarding the items at a location. These are in the form "On the floor you see ..."
        Parameters:
        place - the place of location
        Returns:
        item names
